description.value1: Welcome to the verification process in **{{guild_name}}**!
description.value2: To ensure a secure and enjoyable experience, we have implemented a verification system.
description.value3: Follow the instructions below to get started:
description.value4: 1. Click the **"Start Verification"** button to begin the process.
description.value5: 2. If you need more information, click the **"Information"** button.
description.value6: Feel free to reach out if you encounter any issues or have questions. Enjoy your time in **{{guild_name}}**!

information.author: {{guild_name}} - Verification Information
information.description1: To start the verification process, please make sure your direct messages are enabled for this server.
information.description2: Here's how to enable direct messages for **{{guild_name}}**:
information.description3: 1. Click on the server name in the Discord app.
information.description4: 2. Select **"Privacy Settings"** from the dropdown menu.
information.description5: 3. In the **Privacy Settings**, ensure that **"Direct-messages"** is turned on.
information.description6: Once you've enabled direct messages, click the **"Start Verification"** button again.
information.description7: If you have any questions or encounter issues, feel free to ask for assistance.

start.sentDMToUser: I've sent you a private message. Please proceed to check it and complete the verification process.
start.failedToFetchUser: Failed to retrieve information for {{user_mention}}. Please try again later or contact a staff member if the issue persists.
start.failedToGetData: I'm missing some necessary data to continue the verification process. Please reach out to a staff member for assistance.
start.moduleIsTurnedOff: The verification module has been disabled, and I'm unable to continue the verification process. Please contact a staff member for assistance.

captchaMessage.description: To ensure a secure environment in **{{guild_name}}**, please follow the instructions below to complete the verification process:

fields.name: Verification Instructions:
fields.value1: 1. Type the traced colored characters from left to right.
fields.value4: 4. You have 2 minutes to complete the verification.

start.disabledDirectMessages: To initiate the verification process for **{{guild_name}}**, please enable your direct messages for this server. Click on the **Information** button for a quick guide on how to enable direct messages.
start.verificationPassed: Welcome to **{{guild_name}}**! You now have access to the server. If you have any questions, feel free to ask.
start.failedToFindRole: Oh no! I couldn't locate the verification role. Kindly get in touch with a staff member for assistance.
start.failedToPassVerification: Oh no! It seems you didn't pass the verification stage. As a result, you've been kicked. Don't worry, you can join back and give it another shot. Feel free to try again!
start.kickReason: {{user_global_name}} did not successfully pass the verification process.
